title: Super view on the 16th floor.
text: Great hotel for a weekend getaway. At the moment everything is closed so it‚Äôs easy to get a great view for cheap. My only issue with this hotel is that it has a few rough edges, bathroom decor and furniture. Good staff and location.

title: One of the best museums to see.
text: One of the best museums to see. The pergamon museum is easy to access and tickets are not too expensive. Take your time and enjoy.

title: One of the most amazing sites.
text: The pantheon in Rome is one of the top sites to see. It‚Äôs not a long walk from any of the many bus stops and it‚Äôs easily accessible for the elderly.

title: Amazing site to visit.
text: Amazing site to visit. Plan on a long hike and a lot of heat from the sun. The ground is also very slippery so do ware good shoes.

title: My new favorite Greek vegan restaurant
text: This vegan restaurant is loaded with tasty options. The menu of course is in English and Greek. The tzatziki was excellent! This is not your typical vegan salad bowl place. It‚Äôs like you went to grandmas house to eat. The portions are huge and the food is made like someone cares. I give Veganaki a five for great service, cleanliness and awesome taste. My family enjoyed everything. See you next time.

title: Best hidden gem in Geneva
text: We have eaten here once a week since they first opened. This is one of the best hidden gems of Geneva. I highly recommend the masala dosa. Thank you again Shiva.

title: Great quality food for the money
text: A great restaurant for an authentic taste of India. A list of a few likes: The service is fast and professional. The cleanliness is very good. The location is close to center. The prices are not too expensive. Quality and quantity of the dishes are great. My wife and I will eat here next time we visit town. Thanks for a good evening.

title: Takes you to Greece üá¨üá∑
text: Konstantinos and his team have really nailed it here. I highly recommend this restaurant because it takes you home to Greece. This restaurant has the friendliest staff and the freshest tastes around. You feel the confidence of an experienced chef with the service and execution. (The vegetarian food menu exceeded expectations) We will definitely be back to indulge in this fine Greek food.

title: A trip back in time with a modern touch.
text: My wife and I stayed one night on our visit to the city. We loved the balcony view of the lake and church, we also adored the cute little restaurant downstairs. It felt a bit like dining in a medieval castle. We will definitely stay again. Train station and old town walking distance was a big plus too.

title: Excellent! Great vegan menu!
text: We had a great dinner! The veggie menu is almost completely vegan and a the few that aren‚Äôt can be made so. I have no complaints at all with the service or taste of foods served. Excellent!

title: Excellent vegetarian / vegan
text: Excellent vegetarian / vegan food. Menu is always updated with new and exciting dishes. Great service, with very friendly staff.

title: My wife and I came from Gen√®ve,
text:
My wife and I came from Gen√®ve, Switzerland for a visit to the city, we enjoyed this restaurant most.
My expectations were met and over exceeded. I am a chef and was amazed at how fresh and flavorful the food was. I could not easily replicate this cooking. These guys really know how to cook!
We ate from the vegan menu and had the vegan chicken subji korma, garlic naan and samosas. It was all perfection.

Super

Thanks again Krishna for the experience

Ian and Lisa

title: Great options
text: The best fresh bread in the neighborhood. Vegan bread options, fresh orange juice, great friendly service and good coffee. Recommend.

title: Vegan cakes and food!
text:
We stopped in for some soup, sandwiches and cake. It was all vegan and delicious. The caf√© is about a five minute walk from the train station almost in the middle of M√ºrren. I recommend the vegan banana bread.

Thanks Liv.

title: Vegan bagel burger!
text: Great spot with very friendly service. The menu has good options and the food is super. The French fries alone are worth a visit.

title: Hard bed / transparent bathroom walls
text: Terrible night sleep on a hard bed, t.v wouldn‚Äôt turn off and the bathroom light wakes everyone up (transparent bathroom walls)I‚Äôm not happy with the lack of comfort at this hotel. The staff and location are just fine though. I recommend a more expensive hotel with thicker walls and doors.

title: Meow!
text: Great food with fast and friendly service. I would definitely eat here again. I recommend the rye bread sandwich. Meow!

title: ‚ÄúServed with some love‚Äù
text:
My wife and I just found this little restaurant (hidden gem) around the corner from our apartment. The owner / chef cooked for us two meals from her vegetarian menu and they were delicious.
We will definitely be back to try the buffet.
Great price$ for such great meals.

title: ‚Äú1 year later‚Äù
text: My wife and I have been eating here twice a month for over a year and we have never had a bad experience. We eat from the vegetarian menu and recommend the spicy messer.

title: ‚ÄúOlive Oil With Aged Briam‚Äù
text:
Positive:
The amazing view, fried potatoes, water and view.

Negative:
We asked about the vine leaves ‚ÄúThe Vine leaves are canned‚Äù this is a warning sign at a Greek restaurant.
The white wine they served tasted a bit like a week old pre opened bottle.
The briam I was served was extremely sad, soggy, waterlogged, depressed, laughable, and really was the joke of our vacation.

Conclusion:
I would eat the terrible briam again for the view and laughs. The view!

title: Real fresh food
text:
Our first restaurant in Kalamatta and we are very happy we choose Katelanos. Our food was made with fresh ingredients and served in a professional manner. I rate this restaurant high because of the amount of care, quality and cleanliness. This is a model restaurant.
I would proudly recommend this restaurant to anyone of my friends or family.

Chef Ian.

Ps. The cold beer mug was extra frosty ;)

title: Excellent prices!
text: Our first visit here and we are impressed. The service was professional and the food was perfection. We will definitely be coming back. Merci!

title: ‚ÄúGreat Udon!‚Äù
text: I had my first visit to this lovely little restaurant last night, and I have absolutely no complaints. Great staff, great service, excellent choices, not overpriced, and left on a full stomach. Recommend!

title: ‚ÄúFirst Time‚Äù
text: A friend in the area recommended this restaurant and I was not disappointed. Fast, professional, good quality and taste. The prices where very reasonable. No complaints here. Recommend!

title: ‚ÄúVegan Burger‚Äù
text: This is a great family restaurant with a shake bar. I am a vegan and I usually just get the vegan burger, but you can ask to have the falafel burger made vegan. Recommend!

title: ‚ÄúSoooooo Delicious!‚Äù
text: My fianc√©e and I eat here once a week or so. We have fallen in love with the ramen here. The chef prepares our ramen fast and with care. The staff are always prompt and friendly. We have no complaints for this restaurant. I would only suggest that they add tofu to the menu.

title: ‚ÄúGreat Vibes‚Äù
text: One of the best spots for coffee in old town. Reasonable prices with friendly staff, make this one of my favorite spots for coffee.
